message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $11,500?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $11,500 is below my bottom line.  Could you do $13,000?
I understand your position, but $13,000 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,200?
